string-array.name: endgamebot_options
string-array.item: kpk - K, P vs. K
kbnk - K, B, N vs. K
kbbk - K, B, B vs. K
kqk - K, Q vs. K
krpkr - K, R, P vs. K, R
krk - K, R vs. K
kqkr - K, Q vs. K, R
kppkp - K, P, P vs. K, P
kpkp - K, P vs. K, P
kqpkq - K, Q, P vs. K, Q
knnkp - K, N, N vs. K, P
kppkpp - K, P, P vs. K, P, P
kqqkqr - K, Q, Q vs. K, Q, R

string-array.name: setup_errs
string-array.item: 0 Setup OK
1 Invalid en passant format
2 dummy
3 Invalid square for white en passant
4 Invalid square for black en passant
5 dummy
6 dummy
7 No white king
8 No black king
9 Row for white pawn!
10 Row for black pawn!
11 En passant when half-move clock >0!
12 Other king checked
13 Invalid castling options
14 Invalid en passant
15 Too many white pieces
16 Too many black pieces
17 Impossible white pieces
18 Impossible black pieces
